segments.text: Could you come and help me mend the computer , Neel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't log on the internet again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . Did you change anything on your computer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of anti-virus software do you use ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't have this kind of software .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you riding ? You have to install an anti-virus software on your computer . If not , you will be attacked by viruses , and it can lead your computer into failure .
segments.speaker: S2
